name: Zyra Default ❀˖° (LoRA)
description:
Ohayo (✿◠ᴗ◠)づ Today is Zyra day !! I know so many have been wanting me to make a Lora for her so here she is !!! I will be releasing dragon sorceress Zyra after this one most likely as well !! ^^

Requested by @themangamer123, @PettankoPaizuri, and probably many others Thank you so much for the request !! I really appreciate it ( ˘͈ ᵕ ˘͈♡)

((This Lora does work for photorealistic models sorta for once hehe))

This Lora works with almost every anime model and semi realistic models !! so go wild with it !! ^^

I recommend keeping the weight at (1) and using the negative prompts as needed !!

Please use Trigger words ((naked)), (nude), nipples if your having issues with getting good NSFW generations (specifically with her breast not having nipples) <3

Also use trigger words green_gloves, large_breast, if your having trouble getting all her features and clothing !

I've also found that this Lora struggles heavily with full body images so here's a lower epoch version !! this personally doesn't look as much like Zyra but it helps with getting full body images ^^ I also hate the new versions system so here's a mega link instead ( ｡ •̀ ᴖ •́ ｡)

Click me to download V2

Heres an example photo (˵ •̀ ᴗ - ˵ ) Using the inpaint fix trick will help as well !!

I had so much fun making the Lora and generating the images I hope you have as much fun as I did ⸜(｡˃ ᵕ ˂ )⸝♡ !!!

Please be kind with this Lora ♡

modelVersions.name: Zyra_V1
modelVersions.description:
I highly recommend using the trigger word Zyra_Default.

I also highly recommend keeping the weight between (1) and using negative prompts where needed !

Here are all the settings used for most the examples:

Size: 512x512

Clip skip: 2

Hires upscale: 2

Hires upscaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B

Discard penultimate sigma: True

If you have any issues please tell me and ill try and help !! ૮₍ ˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶ ₎ა

meta.prompt:
detailed background, masterpiece, best quality, Zyra_Default, green_gloves, smile

 <lora:Zyra_Default-04:1>
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2), bad-hands-5,
